comments.author: Dan
comments.message: Really insightful article, Zach. I had not heard of "One Web" before for development, but I love the way that the web is shifting to the device-agnostic approach. Working with mobile excites me, but I'm also a tad overwhelmed. Do you have any beginner resources for getting started with jQuery mobile or Dojo mobile?

comments.author: Zach Leatherman
comments.message: The jQuery Mobile docs are great, and are even written dogfooding jQuery Mobile.
